item.title: Add contour lines from srtm osm
item.description:
From pschnapp...@web.de on October 11, 2011 23:03:13
This is not a bug report but a feature request.
As you might know the popular Android-App Oruxmap is know also using mapsforge to display maps. As it is an outdoor app it would be very useful if it also could disply contour lines. I am not an expert but as far as I could see the map files are created from osm files.
I know there exist osm files from srtm data ( http://geoweb.hft-stuttgart.de/SRTM/ ).
Here comes my question: Is it possible to add the contour lines using the osm srtm data?
This would be a very very useful feature. And as Oruxmaps, which is very popular, is using it I am convinced this will boost mapsforge and make it much more popular. Oruxmaps in combination with mapsforge AND contour lines will be as good as Garmin topo maps.
What do you think about it?
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=184
